turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order for a drink at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location will you make this purchase at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the one that is at 1750 Sheridan St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is this going to be an order for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it will be under the name Alex.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What are you going to be ordering this time Alex?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti iced Starbucks Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It comes with coconut milk, do you want to sub that out?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I want that milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many shots of espresso would you like with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get three shots with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want some caramel drizzles on top of it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me put your oder in for you Alex. It will be one second. Do you want any food to go with this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I just want a drink this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order has been put in and you are ready to pay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Used the card that I have on file with them

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be 7.50. You have a venti iced Starbucks Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte with three shots of espresso and a drizzle of caramel on top. It will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You;re welcome.

items.name: I want a venti iced Starbucks Blonde Vanilla Bean Co
iced Starbucks Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte
